settings.danger_zone.description: Always install and manage plugins using their unproxied links
alert.danger_zone.title: Are you sure?
alert.danger_zone.body: Unproxied plugins can be dangerous since they haven't been verified by staff. Always make sure you trust the developer of the plugin you are trying to install. Are you sure you want to enable this setting?
